messages.content: What should a discharge summary include?

{"answer":"Discharge summaries must be completed within 48 hours and include admission diagnosis, key hospital course, procedures, medication changes, follow up plan, and pending results.","citations":[{"doc_id":"discharge_summary_policy","snippet":"Discharge summaries must be completed within 48 hours of discharge. Include admission diagnosis, key hospital course, procedures, medication changes, follow up plan, and pending results."}],"tool_calls":[],"refusal":false,"follow_up":"Do you want a checklist template?"}
How do we handle prior authorization requests?

{"answer":"Prior authorization requests must include the payer plan, CPT/HCPCS code, clinical justification, and ordering provider NPI. The target SLA is 3 business days, with urgent cases escalated to utilization review.","citations":[{"doc_id":"prior_auth","snippet":"Prior authorization requests must include payer plan, CPT/HCPCS code, clinical justification, and ordering provider NPI. SLA target is 3 business days."}],"tool_calls":[],"refusal":false,"follow_up":"Do you want the standard request template?"}

{"answer":"Include payer plan, CPT or HCPCS code, clinical justification, and ordering provider NPI.","citations":[{"doc_id":"prior_auth","snippet":"include payer plan, CPT/HCPCS code, clinical justification, and ordering provider NPI"}],"tool_calls":[],"refusal":false,"follow_up":"Need help drafting the clinical justification?"}
